name: Tizi Town: Room Design
summary: Do you enjoy decorating rooms and designing houses? Then Tizi Room Design and House Game is the perfect home decor world for you. Create avatars, build a house, craft life story, design floor and decor rooms with the interiror design skills you got. Create life stories and play home design games in this world of avatars. You can decorate kitchen, school, living room, bedroom, dressing rooms, pink room and different themed rooms and be an interior designer. Create home decor that will make you go Aha! Explore a variety of fun and imaginative rooms, such as the enchanting Ice Castle, the cuddly Teddy Bear Room, the vibrant Yellow Greenery, the playful Pink Preschool, the magical Unicorn Bedroom, and so much more. The choice is yours!
